Parameters.Name: DEVICE-1-1-30 GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Parameters.Description: To verify Get Services and Advanced Security Service Capabilities consistency

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Events: Correct response - all is present and false (plus some extra in GetServices)

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Events: Correct response - all is skipped and false (plus some extra in GetServices)

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Events: Correct response - all is present and true (plus some extra in GetServices)

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is present and false (plus some extra in GetServices)

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is skipped (no skipped extensions - in Network and in Security) and false

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is skipped (skipped extensions - lv2) and false

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is skipped (skipped all extensions) and false

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is skipped (DeviceCapabilities elements are skipped) and false

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - GetServices-skipped and GetCapabilities-false

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is GetCapabilities-skipped all elements and GetServices-false

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is GetCapabilities-skipped only parameters w/values and GetServices-false

Test.TestName: GET SERVICES AND GET CAPABILITIES CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Device: Correct response - all is present and true
